title: Growth History
description: View a summary of the month-by-month growth activity for a specific list.

list_id.title: The unique id for the list.
list_id.description: The unique id for the list.

month.title: The month that the growth history is describing.
month.description: The month that the growth history is describing.

subscribed.title: Total subscribed members on the list at the end of the month.
subscribed.description: Total subscribed members on the list at the end of the month.

unsubscribed.title: Newly unsubscribed members on the list for a specific month.
unsubscribed.description: Newly unsubscribed members on the list for a specific month.

reconfirm.title: Newly reconfirmed members on the list for a specific month.
reconfirm.description: Newly reconfirmed members on the list for a specific month.

cleaned.title: Newly cleaned (hard-bounced) members on the list for a specific month.
cleaned.description: Newly cleaned (hard-bounced) members on the list for a specific month.

pending.title: Pending members on the list for a specific month.
pending.description: Pending members on the list for a specific month.

deleted.title: Newly deleted members on the list for a specific month.
deleted.description: Newly deleted members on the list for a specific month.

transactional.title: Subscribers that have been sent transactional emails via Mandrill.
transactional.description: Subscribers that have been sent transactional emails via Mandrill.
